headline: Schwab Trading Activity Index™: STAX Score Climbs Slightly After Three Months of Decline
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, July 08, 2025--The Schwab Trading Activity Index™ (STAX) increased slightly to 40.66 in June, up from its score of 39.68 in May. The only index of its kind, the STAX is a proprietary, behavior-based index that analyzes retail investor stock positions and trading activity from Schwab’s millions of client accounts to illuminate what investors were actually doing and how they were positioned in the markets each month.

headline: Schwab Stock Touches 52-Week High: Is This the Right Time to Buy SCHW?
summary: SCHW just hit a 52-week high. Does the stock still have upside as volatility and asset growth boost its outlook? Let's find out.

headline: Schwab Grows Institutional No Transaction Fee Fund Offering for Independent Advisors
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, July 08, 2025--Schwab Advisor Services™ has increased its institutional no transaction fee (INTF) mutual fund capabilities for independent registered investment advisors (RIAs). The expanded line-up will nearly double its size to approximately 2,000 funds across 58 asset managers.
